attributes.action: Give Christian "Spinner" Lassem an honouary MBE for services to the Internet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Christian "Spinner" Lassem is a program developer from Norway who has created two games which are played on the internet (Planetarion and ManagerLeague) which have given joy to hundreds and thousands of people every day.  In recognition of this, we ask Tony Blair to petition to give this extraordinary man a MBE.
